title: 5.3 Master Challenge 3
question: Create a game on Thunkable that follows the theme: Living and Non-living things. The game should display some living and non-living things at random positions on the game screen. The player should click only the living things and avoid the non-living things that are displayed on the screen. For every correct click, the player should score a positive point and for every wrong click the player should get a negative point

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
